name: SauceDemo E-commerce - Login, Product Browse, Cart Management and Checkout Flow
description: Verify user authentication, product catalog browsing with sorting, cart operations, multi-step checkout process, and order completion
steps: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Enter username 'standard_user' in the input field with id 'user-name'
Enter password 'secret_sauce' in the input field with id 'password'
Click the login button with id 'login-button'
Verify successful login by checking for redirect to the products inventory page with URL '/inventory.html'
Verify the shopping cart icon is visible in the top right corner with class 'shopping_cart_link'
Locate the sort dropdown menu with class 'product_sort_container'
Select 'Price (low to high)' from the sort dropdown
Verify the products are reordered with the lowest priced item appearing first
Click on the first product 'Sauce Labs Backpack' to view product details
Verify the product price '$29.99' is displayed
Click the 'Add to cart' button with id 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack'
Verify the button text changes to 'Remove' after adding to cart
Verify the shopping cart badge displays '1' indicating one item in cart
Click the 'Back to products' button with id 'back-to-products' to return to inventory
Click the 'Add to cart' button with id 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light' on the Bike Light product card
Verify the shopping cart badge updates to '2'
Click the shopping cart icon in the top right corner with class 'shopping_cart_link'
Verify the cart page loads with URL '/cart.html'
Verify 'Sauce Labs Backpack' is listed with quantity 1 and price $29.99
Verify 'Sauce Labs Bike Light' is listed with quantity 1 and price $9.99
Click the 'Checkout' button with id 'checkout' to proceed to checkout
Verify the checkout page loads with URL '/checkout-step-one.html'
Enter first name 'John' in the input field with id 'first-name'
Enter last name 'Doe' in the input field with id 'last-name'
Enter postal code '12345' in the input field with id 'postal-code'
Click the 'Continue' button with id 'continue' to proceed to checkout overview
Verify the checkout overview page loads with URL '/checkout-step-two.html'
Verify 'Sauce Labs Backpack' is listed in the order summary with price $29.99
Verify 'Payment Information' label is displayed
Verify 'Item total: $39.98' is displayed (sum of $29.99 + $9.99)
Verify 'Total' is displayed with class 'summary_total_label' (item total + tax)
Click the 'Finish' button with id 'finish' to complete the order
Verify the order confirmation page loads with URL '/checkout-complete.html'
Verify the success message header 'Thank you for your order!' is displayed with class 'complete-header'
Verify the shopping cart badge is empty or displays '0' after order completion
Click the hamburger menu icon with id 'react-burger-menu-btn' in the top left
Click 'Logout' in the sidebar menu with id 'logout_sidebar_link'
Verify successful logout by checking for redirect to the login page
